      • loadPatient

        public Patient loadPatient(java.lang.String username)
                    throws UserNotFoundException,
                           java.net.ConnectException

        Get a patient from the database if a connection can be established, load from disc otherwise

        Returns:
        patient (Patient that was retrieved or loaded)
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - if the user cannot be found.
        java.net.ConnectException - if we could not connect to the database and could not load the user locally.

      • searchPatient

        public java.util.ArrayList<Problem> searchPatient(java.lang.String username,
                                                  java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> keywords,
                                                  MapLocation map,
                                                  BodyLocation bl)
                                           throws UserNotFoundException,
                                                  java.net.ConnectException

        Search through patient problems and see if it matches any keywords.

        Parameters:
        username - The username of the patient to search.
        keywords - The keywords we are looking for. Can be null.
        map - The map location we are looking for. Can be null.
        bl - The body location we are looking for. Can be null.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of problems that match our search.
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - if the patient cannot be found.3
        java.net.ConnectException - if the database could not be loaded and the user is not found locally.

      • searchPatient

        public java.util.ArrayList<Problem> searchPatient(Patient patient,
                                                  java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> keywords,
                                                  MapLocation map,
                                                  BodyLocation bl)

        Search through patient problems and see if it matches any keywords.

        Parameters:
        patient - The patient to search through.
        keywords - The keywords we are looking for. Can be null.
        map - The map location we are looking for. Can be null.
        bl - The body location we are looking for. Can be null.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of problems that match our search.

      • searchCareProvider

        public java.util.ArrayList<Problem> searchCareProvider(CareProvider careProvider,
                                                       java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> keywords,
                                                       MapLocation map,
                                                       BodyLocation bl)

        Search all care provider patients for all keywords, map, or body location.

        Parameters:
        careProvider - The care provider to search for
        keywords - The keywords, can be null.
        map - The Map location, can be null.
        bl - The body location, can be null.
        Returns:
        A list of problems that match all of the keywords, map, or body location.

      • searchCareProvider

        public java.util.ArrayList<Problem> searchCareProvider(java.lang.String username,
                                                       java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> keywords,
                                                       MapLocation map,
                                                       BodyLocation bl)
                                                throws UserNotFoundException,
                                                       java.net.ConnectException

        Search all care provider patients for all keywords, map, or body location.

        Parameters:
        username - The username of the care provider.
        keywords - The keywords, can be null.
        map - The Map location, can be null.
        bl - The body location, can be null.
        Returns:
        A list of problems that match all of the keywords, map, or body location.
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - if the care provider cannot be found.
        java.net.ConnectException - if the database could not be loaded and the user is not found locally.

      • checkConnectivity

        public boolean checkConnectivity()

        Check if we can connect to the Elastic Search server

        Returns:
        True if a connection can be established, false otherwise
